title: Cloudscape Theme
desc: Kunli Zhan's soundtrack score made to accompany his film, Cloudscape. The Gemseeker bird has his eyes on the great gemstone, only to find that it is actually on the back of the immense Sky Whale. Will he catch his prize through the clouds?

title: First Theme For Endelphia
desc:
A theme track for a WIP project by Endelphia Games.

Lyrics:

In these timid eyes I beheld you, so strong yet weakened
Like a candle's flame extinguishing in this unyielding rain  

Which is worse: hearing my bones twisting until they bend and snap
Or this frozen void, left wondering if this can be called living

This revolting absence is draining everything from me
It's so co-o-old Iâ€™m afraid, for now I cannot feel a thing  

I have known a world of creatures that would haunt all your dreams.
Every night they'd have their way with me, concealing my screams

Fall away from me bones, muscles, skin, and lastly my mask
What remains of me, of us, of love, could we still find a way?

title: Sudden Storm on the Seas
desc: Conditions on the sea change as swiftly as the wind blows.
